availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John L. Scott (Frankfort, Kentucky, attorney and commonwealth’s attorney)

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, attorney and commonwealth’s attorney. Ohio native. Attorney and partner in the firm Simpson & Scott, with James Simpson, in Frankfort in 1861. Commonwealth's attorney for the Eighth Judicial District of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1862 to 1867.

Harney, 1867), p. 354; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 31; Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 1, p. 17; Find A Grave, "Col John L.
